org.lwjgl.stb

Class STBTTBakedChar

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.PointerWrapper
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.stb.STBTTBakedChar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public class STBTTBakedChar
extends Struct
    Baked character data, returned by STBTruetype.stbtt_BakeFontBitmap(java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, float, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, int, int, int, org.lwjgl.stb.STBTTBakedChar.Buffer).

    stbtt_bakedchar members

    MemberTypeDescription
    x0unsigned short
    y0unsigned short
    x1unsigned short
    y1unsigned short
    xofffloat
    yofffloat
    xadvancefloat

    • Constructor Detail

      • STBTTBakedChar

        public STBTTBakedChar(long struct)
        Creates a STBTTBakedChar instance at the specified memory address.

      • STBTTBakedChar

        public STBTTBakedChar(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a STBTTBakedChar instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
